subject: Fixed message ordering issue in chat When sending a message, the optimistic update now maintains proper chronological order by sorting messages in descending order (newest first). Previously, sent messages would appear above older messages until the realtime subscription corrected the order, causing a visual jump. Now messages appear in the correct position immediately. Changes:
body:
Add sorting to optimistic message update in useMessages hook
Ensures consistency with realtime subscription sorting behavior
